title: Apple pecan cake with rum sauce
ingredients: ['For the Cake', '400g caster sugar', '225g margarine', '2 eggs', '2 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons water', '250g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 apples, peeled, cored and diced', '120g chopped pecans', 'For the Rum Sauce', '250ml water', '110g margarine', '200g caster sugar', '2 teaspoons plain flour', '1/8 teaspoon salt', '2 1/4 teaspoons vanilla extract', '2 teaspoons rum essence or rum to taste']
